title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 78.17 - Registration sticker
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 78.17 - Registration sticker

State Regulations

Upon the purchase of a motor vehicle displaying a
windshield validation sticker, a dealer should immediately remove such
windshield validation sticker. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
78.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
